Html:
Is it possible to deploy a transform when the update for Adobe Reader is imported into WPP from the SCUP catalog?

I can certainly do it with a regular update, but it would be nice to be able to apply the transforms to SCUP imports.


Thanks,

Bill

Hi,

no, for instance, you can't modify anything when you publish updates from a catalog. In WPP V2, I will change that.

Awesome, looking forward to it.

Thanks.
